title.rendered: Digiperform is one of the best institutes to learn Digital Marketing – Preeti Mukherjee

content.rendered:
Meet Digiperformer Preeti Mukherjee, a 20-years old girl from Delhi, who got hired as an SEO Executive at Velocity Software Solutions just after completing digital marketing course from Digiperform Connaught Place, Delhi. (About Velocity: Velocity is a modern age technology & business driven professional services firm. They offer services in a variety of areas like – eCommerce, Mobile Development, Office Automation, Website Development on diverse technologies such as Microsoft SharePoint, ASP.Net, Android, PHP, iOS, and Windows 8.) Like always, we decided to get in touch with her and congratulate her for getting her first Digital marketing job as a fresher. During the interaction, we asked her about her learning experience with Digiperform and how it feels to start her career as a digital marketer. We also asked her about the best part of the training and why she had preferred Digiperform to be her mentor in the digital journey. Here’s the transcript of the discussion we had. Have a look!

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Preeti: Hi Everyone, I am Preeti Mukherjee from Delhi. I did my graduation in BBA from GGSIPU. Adding to my qualifications, I have completed my digital marketing course from Digiperform CP, the best digital marketing institute in Delhi. And currently, I am working as an SEO Executive at Velocity Software Solutions.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Preeti: Digital marketing is a dynamic field, and it’s growing at a very fast pace. The field has various job and career opportunities, as every business is now getting digital or utilizing digital media to reach their customers. It becomes a new trend in the market. And, who doesn’t want to be a part of the latest trend? And that’s the reason, I decided to choose digital marketing as my career.

Digiperform: What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Preeti: I was looking for the best institute in digital marketing to grow digitally. And I found Digiperform the best place for it. Furthermore, I heard a lot about Digiperform from my friends. One thing I actually liked about Digiperform that they are very serious when it comes to trainees’ careers. They have experienced faculties. And this really makes Digiperform stand out from the competition.  

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Preeti: I really like the trainers of Digiperform. They are very friendly and ready to help even after the completion of my course. The way of teaching is excellent. I like how the mentors focus on providing practical knowledge while studying modules. As a learner, my favorite experience was when I created my own website.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Preeti: Yes, I  consider Digiperform as a trusted and reliable resource for learning Digital marketing. Here you will get to know about everything that is related to Digital marketing.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Preeti: I would give Digiperform, a perfect 9/10.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Preeti: In the upcoming years, I see myself as a successful Digital marketing professional having in-depth knowledge about this industry

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Preeti: Always think creatively and stay updated about this field.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Preeti: Digiperform is one of the best institutes to learn Digital Marketing
